Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return PolicyYou may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);

var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);

var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Laptop GPU 4GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 1485 Mhz & Max Graphics Power of 75W, NVIDIA DLSS for groundbreaking AI rendering, 11th Gen Intel Core i5-11400H Processor (2.7GHz~4.5GHz), 16GB RAM (64GB Max), Gen4 512GB SSD, 15.6″ Thin Bezel FHD 1920×1080 IPS-level ​Anti-glare Display LCD (144Hz, 72% NTSC)​, X-Rite Pantone Certified, per unit factory calibrated, Windforce Infinity Next-gen Cooling for Laptop, 49W Battery, 4.8lb, 15 Full Area Colored RGB Backlit Keyboard; 14.21 (W) x 10.15 (D) x 1.09(H) inch
Boost Clock 1485 Mhz & Max Graphics Power of 75W
NVIDIA DLSS for groundbreaking AI rendering
1th Gen Intel Core i5-11400H Processor (2.7GHz~4.5GHz)
16GB RAM (64GB Max), Gen4 512GB SSD
15.6″ Thin Bezel FHD 1920×1080 IPS-level ​Anti-glare Display LCD (144Hz, 72% NTSC)​
X-Rite Pantone Certified, per unit factory calibrated
Windforce Infinity Next-gen Cooling for Laptop, 49W Battery, 4.8lb
15 Full Area Colored RGB Backlit Keyboard; 14.21 (W) x 10.15 (D) x 1.09(H) inch


About Us

GIGABYTE offers a comprehensive product lineup that aims to “Upgrade Your Life.” With expertise encompassing consumer, business, gaming, and cloud systems, GIGABYTE established its reputation as one of the leaders in the industry with products including motherboards, graphics cards, laptops, mini PCs, monitors, and other PC components and accessories.

Read more




That which resonates with your life

“Upgrade Your Life” is the core essence in everything we do at GIGABYTE. We break new ground. We also continuously provide reliable cloud infrastructure to help businesses optimize their operations as well as to advance development and expansion in the digital realm. By combining innovation and practicality, GIGABYTE wields the technology of the future to improve your life today.

When ideas manifest into reality

We have your bases covered, starting with the motherboard. With an established reputation for trusted quality, we pushed forward with graphics cards, laptops, and mini PCs, and corporations worldwide depend on us for reliable server solutions. Most of all, we have always been there innovating products that will spark your creativity.

Foretelling your future in tech

Visualize this: Tapping your phone connects you to cloud. Your city is on a 5G network integrating medical, transportation, and power services. Our vast product range can meet your personal, business, and computing needs and prepare you for future trends and developments. Using technology, we can achieve anything we visualize, and beyond.

Read more

With a 11th Generation InteI Core mobile processor, the Flex 5i touchscreen laptop gives you powerful combination of performance, connectivity, and entertainment on a thin, light computer
The IdeaPad Flex 5i lets you keep your ideas flowing – the 360⁰ hinge lets you use it in ‘Laptop’ mode for everyday computing, ‘Tent’ mode for sharing things, ‘Stand’ mode for binge-watching, or ‘Tablet’ mode for more intuitive interaction
Reduce clutter with a narrow bezel on 4 sides, IPS panel technology, and a 14″ full high-definition touchscreen
A physical shutter on the webcam ensures you keep out unwanted attention when you are concerned about your privacy
Connect with built-in WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5, 2 USB-A ports, USB-C, HDMI, card reader, and 3.5mm headphone & microphone combo jack

【Upgraded to 512GB solid-state drive (PCI-e)】Save files fast and store more data. With massive amounts of storage and advanced communication power, PCI-e NVMe SSDs are great for major gaming applications, multiple servers, daily backups, and more.

var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Price: $389.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:38 UTC – Details)

Product Description

ATOPNUC Mini PC, Powerful & Professional Mini computers.

ATOPNUC Mini computers comes with Windows 11 Pro installed.

Why choose ATOPNUC Mini PC?

-Small size only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inches, ideal portable mobile office computer.-8th Gen Intel Core i5-8279U up to 4.1Ghz, power processing multiple task.-Pre-installed Windows 11 Pro operation system, also supports Ubuntu & Linux.-16GB DDR4 & 512GB SSD, large compacity ensure running multi-tabs no lagging, don’t slow down the operation drastically, flexible expansion: RAM to 32GB maximum, SSD to 1TB maximum.-Dual 4K screen display. support connect with two 4k@30Ghz screen for multiple task handling at the same time.-Multi-Ports more function, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port.-Strong wireless 2.5Ghz+5G dual band WiFi5, 1000 Mb/s Gigabit Ethernet + bluetooth 5.0, Keyboard/Mouse connected works flawlessly.-Quiet Fan work silent, doesn’t overheat. the fan beneath the mini pc. high performance heat dissipation for the hardware.

The feature of ATOPNUC Mini desktop PC:

Specification of ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Processor Intel Coffee Lake i5 8279U (6M Cache, up to 4.1 GHz) Graphics Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 (300 MHz-1.15GHz, support 4K@60Hz) Memory 16GB, Dual-channel DDR4-2400, support DIY up to 32GB Storage 512GB (M.2 PCIE 2280 SSD), support install 1*2.5″ SATA HDD (7 mm), up to 2 TB Operating System Windows 11 Pro , also support Ubuntu & Linux Wireless Connectivity Bluetooth 5.0 & 2.5G+ 5G Dual-Band Wi-Fi Video Output 2* HDMI (4K@30Hz) Audio Output HDMI, Display Port, 3.5mm Audio Jack Gigabit Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN Power Adapter Automatics Voltage adjustment between 100 and 240V AC,50/60Hz, 65Watts(19V/3.42A) VESA Mount Included Kensington Lock Yes Interface 4*USB 3.0 ports， 1* Type-C ports, 2* HDMI port, 1* Gigabit Ethernet Port, 1* TF card reader

Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors

The Mini pc comes with Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors with 4 cores & 8 threads. base operating frequency is 2.40 GHz/s rising to a 4.10 GHz in burst mode.

Large Expandable Storage

The mini desktop computer comes with 16GB DDRS RAM expandable to 32GB maximum and 512GB NVME SSD supports 2.5 inch SSD or HDD expandable 2TB storage capacity (not included)) to expand storage.

Dual 4K@30Hz HDMI Ports

the mini desktop PC equipped with 2 HDMI ports supports 4K@30Hz dual screen display, running the 4K UHD video smooth without any issues.

High performance heat dissipation

This small form factor PC has a user-friendly and intimate design. Fan and heat sink dual boost, cooling the Mini PC when the PC runs the heavy job but a trade-off to keep the PC running efficiently without any issue.

Mini size & Power performance

The mini computers is only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inch, portable design, you can carry it anywhere, perfect mobile office pc for business. even the small pc size but the performance is powerful, parallelly used multi-tabs without any issue and playing multiple web browsing and video windows together definitely works as well.

Easy to Installation with VESA mount

The micro desktop computer shipped with VESA mount, easy to install the PC on the wall or back of the monitor or TV. saving space and convenient carry the PC to anywhere while business trips.

Multiple Application MINI PC

FAQ of the ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Q1: is the Windows 11 Pro already installed?

A: Yes, ATOPNUC mini pc comes with Windows 11 Pro pre-installed. no need activation key.feel free to use other operating system, such as Linux, Ubuntu…

Q2: How to enter BIOS?

A: turn on the portable mini computers firstly. press and hold the ” F2 ” key until enter the BIOS.

Q3: Can i change the operation system?

A:Yes, you can change the operation to Windows 10 or Ubuntu, Linux and others by yourself or contact with us to get the update file.

Q4: How can i enable multi-screen?

A: The small pc comes with dual 4K@30Hz HDMI ports can be extended to connect to two monitors, allowing you to handle multi-task at the same time.

Q5: Is the copact pc noisy when running?

A: To cool the machine’s hardware, ATOPNUC Mini PC only produces about 30 decibels of fan sound when fully loaded. Most of the time it’s within the normal range. silent fan and high performance for the cooling.

Kindly Notes:

Please read the User Manual carefully before using the ATOPNUC Mini PC to learn more about it.

Any questions please feel free to let us know at the first time before you use or need update the software.

Our Type-C port only data transfer, please kindly note it.

CPU
Intel Core i5-8279U Intel Core i5-1135G7 AMD Ryzen 5 5600U AMD Ryzen 7 3750H Intel Celeron N4020

Base/Burst Frequency
2.4GHz up to 4.1 GHz 2.4GHz up to 4.2 GHz 2.3GHz up to 4.2 GHz 2.3GHz up to 4.0 GHz 1.1GHz up to 2.8GHz

Operation System
Windows 11 Pro Windows 11 Pro Windows 11 Pro Windows 11 Pro Windows 10 Pro

[Intel i5-8279U Mini PC with Win11 Pro] Mini computers featuring the intel i5-8279U processor, 4 cores 8 thead, 6MB Cache, Max Turbo frequency up to 4.1 Ghz, this mini computers has desktop-grade performance, efficient core able to handle multi-task, the small computer delivers high performance for a widely hom, office, gaming, business use.
[Large Storage Expansion &Quiet] Mini desktop computers comes with high speed 16GB DDR4 memory and 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD, allow the computer handle the several operations at the same time, expand the capacity with M2 SSD/NVM2 SSD interface to 1TB or 2.5 inch SATA HDD up to 2TB(not included).
[Multi-Port, Fast transfer] Windows 11 mini computers equipped with 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI 1.4 ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port. , USB-C port support 10Gbps Super speed data transfer. WiFi 2.4G+5G Dual Band networking ensures stable, high-speed data transfers, even in crowded networking environments. Bluetooth 5.0 connect faster Speed, Farther Coverage.
[4K resolution and Dual Display Monitor] The micro desktop computers comes with integrated Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 in stunning 4K UHD resolution, Dual HDMI port ensure connector with two monitors, feel free to enjoy TVs and video, home theater.
[Perfect heat dissipation, Low noise] The ATOPNUC mini computer equipped with the high performance cooling fan, runs quietly cool down the mini desktop pc’s hardare to be perfectly heat dissipation.
Connectivity Technology : LAN
Wireless Comm Standard : 802_11_AC

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $749.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:08:08 UTC – Details)


Acer Aspire C24-1650-UA92 All-in-One Desktop PC comes with these specs: 11th Generation Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor 2.4GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 4.2GHz (8MB Smart Cache), Windows 11 Home, 23.8″ Full HD Widescreen Edge-to-Edge LED Back-lit IPS Display, Intel Iris Xe Graphics, 8GB DDR4 Memory, 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD, Integrated 1.0 MP HD Webcam with 2 Stereo Microphones, Wi-Fi 6 802.11ax Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz featuring 2×2 MU-MIMO technology 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet, Bluetooth 5.0, Two Built-in Stereo Speakers, 1 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 1 port (Rear), 2 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 2 ports (Rear), 1 – USB 2.0 (Type A) port (bottom, reseved for RF dongle), 1 – HDMI-out Port (Rear), 1 – Ethernet RJ-45 Port, Wireless Keyboard and Mouse, 15.43 lbs. | 6.99 kg (system unit only), 1 Year Parts and Labor Limited Warranty with Toll Free Tech Support (DQ.BFSAA.001)
Breaking the boundaries of performance with the Intel Core i5-1135G7 Processor – up to 4.20 GHz, 4 cores, 8 threads, 8 MB Intel Smart Cache | Intel Iris Xe Graphics
23.8″ Full HD Widescreen IPS LED Back-lit Screen | 8GB 3200MHz DDR4 Memory | 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD
Wi-Fi 6 802.11ax Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz featuring 2×2 MU-MIMO technology | Bluetooth 5.0 | 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN
1 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 1 port (Rear) | 2 – USB 3.2 (Type A) Gen 2 ports (Rear) | 1 – USB 2.0 (Type A) port (bottom, reseved for RF dongle) | 1 – HDMI-out Port (Rear)
Integrated 1.0 MP HD Webcam with 2 Stereo Microphones | Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Included | Windows 11 Home

A Modern Design for the Modern World

The Aspire C24 All-in-One PC packs all the essential computing features you need into a slim, space-saving design that’s simple to use, functional and looks great on your desk. This PC features the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, Intel Iris Xe graphic and fast Wi-Fi 6 connectivity for an awesome computing experience. Enjoy a crisp and clear experience on the 23.8″ Full HD display while the impressively thin bezels give you more to look at. (Wireless Keyboard and Mouse included)

Previous page

  2. Borderless Design

    The 23.8” Full FHD borderless display let you experience clearer images and vibrant entertainment.

  3. Stand Thin, Stand Tall

    The ultrathin design saves on space and gives any room an extra touch of elegance.

Next page

1 11th Gen Intel Core i5 2 23.8″ FHD Display 3 Ultra-Thin Design

Glorious Display

See more details and sharper colors on the FHD display. With a 0.14″ narrow bezel and a screen-to-body ratio of up to 88% you get to see more of the screen at viewing angles of 178°.

Plenty of Storage

Videos, photos, music, games and applications all take up a lot of storage space but users won’t need to fear it filling up. With 512GB NVMe M.2 SSD and 8GB DDR4 Ram there’s lots of storage.

Privacy is Key

The Webcam at the top of Aspire C24 has a camera shutter that you can easily open and shut by sliding it with your finger for safeguarding your privacy when the webcam is not in use.

Ready to Assist

Effortlessly interact with Cortana while the device is in Modern Standby mode and enjoy crystal-clear audio with DTS: X audio. You can also further streamline your smart environment with Alexa to truly make your home run as smoother than ever before imagined.

4.5
Price: $749.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:08:08 UTC – Details)
